tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE user_generated_content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    content TEXT,
    comment TEXT,
    review TEXT,
    rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE ratings (
  rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT,
  media_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    media_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    media_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    review_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE ratings (
    rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    media_id INT,
    rating FLOAT,
    rated_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT,
    review_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    title VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT,
    upload_date TIMESTAMP,
    user_id INT
);
